description.value: Character is immune to Seduction and Charm Tests have -10 against them. Gain one Insanity Point on gaining this Talent. When in a Social Conflict, character gains +20 to Opposed Tests where the opponents are trying to Charm them. Talent was previously known as Chem Geld in Prior editions.
